'''Billy Sheehan''' is a patient who was injured when he broke into someone's house.

==History==
Billy broke into someone's house. The owner of the house beat him with a golf club, seriously injuring him. He was arrested and brought to the hospital. He had bruising all over his back. They did x-rays, which showed a burst fracture. They planned to put in transpedicle screws to stabilize his back and prevent paralysis. He needed surgery, but was warned that he'd possibly have weakness in his legs.

After his surgery, he was told he'd have about 70% function.

==Notes and Trivia==
*He stole [[April Kepner|April's]] red notebook for [[Lexie Grey|Lexie]].
